customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
No status on system message in standard view
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Observe any system message that wraps to a second line (can produce system message by editing a channel header to something long)
inline.expectedResult: • System messages should not have status indicator in standard view.

inline.description:
No status on system message in compact view
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Observe any system message that wraps to a second line (can produce system message by editing a channel header to something long)
inline.expectedResult: • System messages should not have status indicator in compact view.
